mapper.select:
select
from da_enterprise_info where 1 = 1
and id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and administration_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.administrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and administrative_area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.administrativeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(approval_date)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginApprovalDate})
AND unix_timestamp(approval_date)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endApprovalDate})
and archives_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.archivesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(business_duetime)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginBusinessDuetime})
AND unix_timestamp(business_duetime)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endBusinessDuetime})
and business_scope LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and category_code = #{EntityRelated.categoryCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and category_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.categoryText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and common_field_id = #{EntityRelated.commonFieldId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and core_code = #{EntityRelated.coreCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and core_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.coreText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and corporation_identity_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.corporationIdentityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and corporation_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.corporationMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and corporation_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.corporationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and enterprise_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterpriseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and enterprise_code = #{EntityRelated.enterpriseCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and enterprise_control LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterpriseControl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and enterprise_nature_code = #{EntityRelated.enterpriseNatureCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and enterprise_nature_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterpriseNatureText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and enterprise_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterprisePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and enterprise_type_code = #{EntityRelated.enterpriseTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and enterprise_type_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterpriseTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(establish_date)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginEstablishDate})
AND unix_timestamp(establish_date)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endEstablishDate})
AND unix_timestamp(found_date)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginFoundDate})
AND unix_timestamp(found_date)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endFoundDate})
and funnel_tags_code = #{EntityRelated.funnelTagsCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and funnel_tags_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.funnelTagsText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and id = #{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and industry_activity LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.industryActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and industry_code = #{EntityRelated.industryCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and industry_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.industryText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and industry_type_code = #{EntityRelated.industryTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and industry_type_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.industryTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and is_cooperative_code = #{EntityRelated.isCooperativeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and is_cooperative_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.isCooperativeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and is_corporate_champion_type_code = #{EntityRelated.isCorporateChampionTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and is_corporate_champion_type_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.isCorporateChampionTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and landline_telephone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.landlineTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and linkman LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and linkman_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.linkmanMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and logo_resource_id = #{EntityRelated.logoResourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and logo_resource_path LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.logoResourcePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and longdistance_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.longdistanceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and manage_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.manageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and measure_latitude LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.measureLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and measure_longitude LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.measureLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and money_scale LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.moneyScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and organization_code = #{EntityRelated.organizationCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and organization_id = #{EntityRelated.organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and organization_type_code = #{EntityRelated.organizationTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and organization_type_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.organizationTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and person_scale LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.personScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and professional_activity LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.professionalActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and region_code = #{EntityRelated.regionCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and region_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.regionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and register_status_code = #{EntityRelated.registerStatusCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and register_status_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.registerStatusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and register_type_code = #{EntityRelated.registerTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and register_type_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.registerTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and registration_mark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.registrationMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and registry_office LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.registryOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and risk_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.riskGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and risk_tags_code = #{EntityRelated.riskTagsCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and risk_tags_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.riskTagsText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and scale_enterprise_type_code = #{EntityRelated.scaleEnterpriseTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and scale_enterprise_type_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.scaleEnterpriseTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and society_credit_id = #{EntityRelated.societyCreditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and statistics_Department_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.statisticsDepartmentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and summary LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and telautogram LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.telautogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and trade_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.tradeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and year_they LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.yearThey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and zip_code = #{EntityRelated.zipCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by
${Order.columnName}
ASC
DESC
